verses.verse: For TZiyon's <WH6726> sake will I not hold my peace <WH2814> <WH8799>, and for Yerushalayim's <WH3389> sake I will not rest <WH8252> <WH8799>, until the righteousness <WH6664> thereof go forth <WH3318> <WH8799> as brightness <WH5051>, and the salvation <WH3444> thereof as a Menorah <WH3940> that burneth <WH1197> <WH8799>.

And the goyim <WH1471> shall see <WH7200> <WH8804> thy righteousness <WH6664>, and all kings <WH4428> thy glory <WH3519>: and thou shalt be called <WH7121> <WH8795> by a new <WH2319> name <WH5344> <WH8799>, which the mouth <WH6310> of the YY <WH3068> shall name <WH8034>.
Thou shalt also be a crown <WH5850> of glory <WH8597> in the hand <WH3027> of the YY <WH3068>, and a royal <WH4410> diadem <WH6797> <WH8675> <WH6797> in the hand <WH3709> of thy 'Elohim <WH430>.

Thou shalt no more be termed <WH559> <WH8735> Forsaken <WH5800> <WH8803>; neither shall thy land <WH776> any more be termed <WH559> <WH8735> Desolate <WH8077>: but thou shalt be called <WH7121> <WH8735> Hephzibah <WH2657>, and thy land <WH776> Beulah <WH1166> <WH8803>: for the YY <WH3068> delighteth <WH2654> <WH8804> in thee, and thy land <WH776> shall be married <WH1166> <WH8735>.

For as a young man <WH970> marrieth <WH1166> <WH8799> a virgin <WH1330>, so shall thy sons <WH1121> marry <WH1166> <WH8799> thee: and as the bridegroom <WH2860> rejoiceth <WH4885> over the bride <WH3618>, so shall thy 'Elohim <WH430> rejoice <WH7797> <WH8799> over thee.

I have set <WH6485> <WH8689> watchmen <WH8104> <WH8802> upon thy walls <WH2346>, O Yerushalayim <WH3389>, which shall never <WH8548> hold their peace <WH2814> <WH8799> day <WH3117> nor night <WH3915>: ye that make mention <WH2142> <WH8688> of the YY <WH3068>, keep not silence <WH1824>,
And give <WH5414> <WH8799> him no rest <WH1824>, till he establish <WH3559> <WH8787>, and till he make <WH7760> <WH8799> Yerushalayim <WH3389> a praise <WH8416> in the earth <WH776>.

The YY <WH3068> hath sworn <WH7650> <WH8738> by his right hand <WH3225>, and by the arm <WH2220> of his strength <WH5797>, Surely I will <WH518> no more give <WH5414> <WH8799> thy corn <WH1715> to be meat <WH3978> for thine enemies <WH341> <WH8802>; and the sons <WH1121> of the stranger <WH5236> shall not drink <WH8354> <WH8799> thy wine <WH8492>, for the which thou hast laboured <WH3021> <WH8804>:

But they that have gathered <WH622> <WH8764> it shall eat <WH398> <WH8799> it, and praise <WH1984> <WH8765> the YY <WH3068>; and they that have brought it together <WH6908> <WH8764> shall drink <WH8354> <WH8799> it in the courts <WH2691> of my holiness <WH6944>.

Go through <WH5674> <WH8798>, go through <WH5674> <WH8798> the gates <WH8179>; prepare <WH6437> <WH8761> ye the way <WH1870> of the people <WH5971>; cast up <WH5549> <WH8798>, cast up <WH5549> <WH8798> the highway <WH4546>; gather out <WH5619> <WH8761> the stones <WH68>; lift up <WH7311> <WH8685> a standard <WH5251> for the people <WH5971>.

Behold, the YY <WH3068> hath proclaimed <WH8085> <WH8689> unto the end <WH7097> of the world <WH776>, Say <WH559> <WH8798> ye to the daughter <WH1323> of TZiyon <WH6726>, Behold, thy salvation <WH3468> cometh <WH935> <WH8802>; behold, his reward <WH7939> is with him, and his work <WH6468> before <WH6440> him.

And they shall call <WH7121> <WH8804> them, The holy <WH6944> people <WH5971>, The redeemed <WH1350> <WH8803> of the YY <WH3068>: and thou shalt be called <WH7121> <WH8735>, Sought out <WH1875> <WH8803>, A city <WH5892> not forsaken <WH5800> <WH8737>.
